name: Hidden Safety - No Feasible Task - Redesign
description: Hidden safety failure with no CBM or FT option must result in REDESIGN
assertions: RTF must NOT be selected for hidden safety

name: Evident Operational - CBM Selected
description: Evident operational failure with both CBM conditions met selects CONDITION_BASED
assertions: CBM takes priority over FT even when both are feasible
secondary task required for CBM path
frequency unit OPERATING_HOURS valid for ABRASION cause

name: Evident Environmental - FT Not Applicable for Random Pattern
description: Environmental failure with ft_feasible=true but E_RANDOM pattern must result in REDESIGN, not FT
assertions: FT not selected because E_RANDOM is not age-related
REDESIGN selected because environmental consequence never allows RTF
ft_feasible=true is overridden by non-age-related pattern

name: Evident Operational - Run to Failure Fallback
description: Operational failure with no feasible proactive task falls through to RTF
assertions: RTF is acceptable for operational consequence
no secondary task needed for RTF

name: Hidden Non-Safety - Fault Finding
description: Hidden non-safety failure with no CBM or FT results in Fault Finding
assertions: Fault Finding selected for hidden non-safety
